Main pronunciation 主要发音: shàn

Original meaning 本义: Meaning virtuous.

English senses 英语理解: good, virtuous, charitable, kind

Usage example 用法举例: 善良 shàn liáng (kindhearted)

Shuowen 说文解字: 篆文善從言

譱字的基本解释

譱
shàn
古同“善”。

譱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shàn］
［《廣韻》常演切，上獮，禪。］
亦作“譱1”。
(1)吉祥；好；美好。
(2)善行；善事。善人。
(3)好处，优点。
(4)和善；老实；好对付。
(5)交好；亲善。
(6)指信奉佛教的人或与佛教有关的事物。参见“善男信女”、“善友”、“善緣”等。
(7)使之善；改善。
(8)表示赞同、应诺。
(9)表示赞叹。
(10)赞美；褒扬。
(11)喜好。
(12)谓欣羡。
(13)擅长；善于。
(14)通晓；熟练；熟悉。
(15)修治；治理。
(16)大；高；丰。
(17)多。参见“善懷”。
(18)容易。
(19)妥善；好好地。
(20)成功。参见“善敗”。
(21)适意；适宜。
(22)爱惜。参见“善日”、“善時”。
(23)揩拭。参见“善刀”。
(24)方言。轻；少；不厉害。
(25)通“膳”。膳食。
(26)姓。五代有善友，宋有善辰，明有善养。见《正字通·口部》。

譱字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譱； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1184第01
【唐韻】常衍切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】上演切，?膳上聲。【說文】吉也。从誩从羊，與義美同意。【前漢·禮樂志】安上治民，莫譱於禮。移風易俗，莫譱於樂。【師古註】古善字。　又【玉篇】大也。　又人名。崇譱，見【宋史·宗室表】。　【說文】篆文作?。【集韻】隸作善。亦作嬗。

Xian
Basic explanation of words
Xian
shàn
Gu Tong is "good".
Xian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shàn］
["Guangyun" often plays and cuts, goes up and down, and Zen. ]
Also known as "譱1".
(1) Auspicious; good; beautiful.
(2) Good deeds; good deeds. Good people.
(3) Benefits, advantages.
(4) Kind; honest; easy to deal with.
(5) Good friendship; goodwill.
(6) Refers to people who believe in Buddhism or things related to Buddhism. See "good men and women", "good friends", "good destiny", etc.
(7) Make it good; improve.
(8) Agree and promise.
(9) Express admiration.
(10) Praise; praise.
(11) Preferences.
(12) That is envy.
(13) Good at; good at.
(14) Familiar; skilled; familiar.
(15) Repair and governance; governance.
(16) Big; high; abundant.
(17) Many. See "goodness".
(18) Easy.
(19) Properly; well.
(20) Success. See "good failure".
(21) Appropriate; appropriate.
(22) Cherish. See "good day", "good time".
(23) Wipe. See "Good Knife".
(24) Dialects. Light; less; not powerful.
(25) Through "food". meal.
(26) Last name. The Five Dynasties had good friends, Song had Shanchen, and Ming had good nourishment. See "Zhengzitong·koubu".
Xian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　譱; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1184 01
[Tang Yun] Chang Yanqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] staged cutting, sounded after dinner. [Said Wen] Ji Ye. From the purlin to the sheep, agree with Yimei. 【Former Han·Liyuezhi】Govern the people in peace, and don't take rites. Change customs and customs, don't be happy. 【Shigu Note】Ancient good characters.　[Jade articles] Da Ye.　Another name. Chongzhen, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Speaking] Seal writing?. [Jiyun] Li Zuoshan. Also for ho.
